 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עפאים‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֳפָיִם‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] **noun [masculine] plural** ==foliage== (compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:93z»§ 93z</sup>; Aramaic loan-word, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפְיָא‎</span> ***foliage***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flower, branch***); — [[Ps.104.12|Ps 104:12]]. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עפא‎</span> (√ of following; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲפָא‎</span> Pa., Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa., ***enwrap***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֳפִי‎</span> ***foliage***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flower***, etc., Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עפאים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֳפָיִם‎</span> as loan-word; compare perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***upû***</u></abbr>, ***cloud*** (-mass)).
